tool_description:
AppsBuilder is a do it yourself platform for mobile applications development. No coding skills are needed! Trough a single building process users can create an app for iOS (iPad, iPhone/iPod), Android (Tablets & Phones) and Windows Phone. Last but not least, your app will be available for the Chrome Web Store and with a Mobile Site Html5 version.

All content is stored on Cloud, enabling real time updates.

All JSON structures can also be retrieved here: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/App+JSON
name: AppsBuilder
title: AppsBuilder

api_list.name: Edit Feed
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to edit one of his feeds.

required_parameters.name: feed_id
required_parameters.description: This is the feed ID.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: This is the feed name.

optional_parameters.name: last
optional_parameters.description: This value indicates how many items should be shown for this feed.

optional_parameters.name: orderby
optional_parameters.description: This value indicates by which field the list should be sorted. Possible values: "title|data|index|geo".

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: This value indicates the order direction. Possible values: "ASC|DESC".

api_list.name: Create Feed
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to create a new feed. Returns the ID of the newly created feed, or an error message.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: This is the name for the new feed.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: This is the new feed type. Possible values can be retrieved by using the method /feedgenerator/feedtypes.

optional_parameters.name: last
optional_parameters.description: This value indicates how many items should be shown for this feed.

api_list.name: Assign App to User
api_list.description: Allows a CMS admin/superuser to assign an app to a user.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: This is the user ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Delete App Style
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to delete one of his apps style options.

required_parameters.name: style
required_parameters.description: This is the name of the style option to be deleted.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Add/Edit Feed Item
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to add or edit an item for one of his feeds. Returns the index of the newly created or edited item. More accurate informations can be found here: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

required_parameters.name: active
required_parameters.description: This indicates if the item should be visible or not. Possible values are respectively: 1|0.

required_parameters.name: feed_id
required_parameters.description: This is the feed ID.

optional_parameters.name: index
optional_parameters.description: This is the item index. If set and existing, the item with this value will be updated with the new informations.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: This is the item title.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: This is the item description.

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description: This is the item link.

optional_parameters.name: data
optional_parameters.description: This is the item date. Default value: CURRENT_TIMESTAMP.

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: This is the item latitude.

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: This is the item longitude.

optional_parameters.name: thumb
optional_parameters.description: This is the item thumbnail URL.

optional_parameters.name: content
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: option
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: author
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: editor
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: linkedin
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: twitter
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: facebook
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: street
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: cap
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: winery
optional_parameters.description: This value is used only on some feed types, and with different meanings. Please refer to the following page to have a detailed overview: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/Feed+Types

optional_parameters.name: sale
optional_parameters.description: This indicates if the e-commerce option should be enabled or not.

optional_parameters.name: price
optional_parameters.description: This is the element price.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: This is the price currency. Possible values: USD | EUR | GBP.

optional_parameters.name: discounted
optional_parameters.description: This indicates if the element is in discount or not.

optional_parameters.name: internal
optional_parameters.description: This indicates whether the sale should be managed by AppsBuilder or externally.

optional_parameters.name: external_link
optional_parameters.description: This is the url to externally manage the sale, in case of variable internal set to "0" .

api_list.name: Enable Custom App Auth
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to turn on and set a Custom access control on one of his apps. How the Custom access control works: All the passed URLs should implement a login/check/logout/register login by themself. On each request an unique identifier is sent in the HTTP headers; the header name is X-APPSBUILDER-ID. Each passed URLs must return 1 on success and 0 on failure.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/setAuth/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/setAuth/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Add Web Redirect To Mobile
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to set up, for one of his apps, a redirect script that can be used on a website  to display a clickable message to visitors if a native version of the app is available based on their device OS. The script will be available at the following URL: http://www.apps-builder.com/libs/redirect/{id}.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

optional_parameters.name: android
optional_parameters.description: This is the URL of the Google Play app page.

optional_parameters.name: apple
optional_parameters.description: This is the URL of the App Store app page.

optional_parameters.name: windows
optional_parameters.description: This is the URL of the Windows Marketplace app page.

api_list.name: Delete App Layoutoption Value
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to remove an app (first page) layoutoption value.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: This is the name of the option to be removed.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Add APN Certificate
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to upload an Apple Push Notification Certificate for one of his apps.

required_parameters.name: p12
required_parameters.description: This is the .p12 binary file, generated without any passwords set.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Update App Infos
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to update the infos for one of his apps. Returns "1" in case of success, "false" otherwise. All the parameters are optional.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

optional_parameters.name: titolo
optional_parameters.description: This is the app title.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: This is the app language in a two (2) chars encoding.

optional_parameters.name: descrizione
optional_parameters.description: This is the app description.

optional_parameters.name: keywords
optional_parameters.description: This contains the keywords of the app; multiple values must be separated by commas.

optional_parameters.name: url_support
optional_parameters.description: This is the app URL for support.

optional_parameters.name: email_support
optional_parameters.description: This is the app email for support.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: This is the app category.

optional_parameters.name: infos
optional_parameters.description: This contains the informations that will display when clicking on the "info button" of the app.
optional_parameters.default: This app is powered by myself

optional_parameters.name: bundle_android
optional_parameters.description: This is the Android bundle name.

optional_parameters.name: bundle_apple
optional_parameters.description: This is the Apple bundle name.

optional_parameters.name: google_verification
optional_parameters.description: This is the Google verification code.

optional_parameters.name: public
optional_parameters.description: This indicates if the app should be public or private (invisible to users). Possible respectively values: "1|0".

optional_parameters.name: app_icon
optional_parameters.description: This is the app icon URL. Alternatively to the image URL, a FILE can be passed.

optional_parameters.name: splash_image
optional_parameters.description: This is the app splash image URL. Alternatively to the image URL, a FILE can be passed.

optional_parameters.name: privacy_url
optional_parameters.description: This is the app privacy URL.

optional_parameters.name: dns
optional_parameters.description: This is the app DNS.

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: This is the app phone number for support.

api_list.name: Register AppsBuilder User
api_list.description: Allows a new user to register on the AppsBuilder website. Notice: this function acts on AppsBuilder platform, not on CMS. Returns "true" or a text error with failure reasons.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: This is a valid username.

required_parameters.name: password
required_parameters.description: This is a valid password.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: This is a valid email.

optional_parameters.name: activate
optional_parameters.description: This indicates if the user is automatically activated or it has to be, through the email link. Possible values: 1 (automatically activated), 0 (email link).

optional_parameters.name: referer
optional_parameters.description: This is an optional referer where the registration comes from.

api_list.name: Register User
api_list.description: Allows a new user to register. Returns the newly created user ID (a number) or a text error with failure reasons.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: This is a valid username.

required_parameters.name: password
required_parameters.description: This is a valid password.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: This is a valid email.

required_parameters.name: cms_id
required_parameters.description: This is the CMS ID where the user wants to register.

api_list.name: Set App Expire Time
api_list.description: Allows a CMS admin to set an Expire Time for an app.

required_parameters.name: app_id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

required_parameters.name: expire
required_parameters.description: This is the number of days after which the app will expire.

api_list.name: Set App Layout
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to set the app (first page) a new layout and a new layoutoption object.

required_parameters.name: layout
required_parameters.description: This is the new layout to be used for the app (first page). Possible values: "list|grid1|grid|grid3|grid4|grid5|lowpanel|fixedmenu".

required_parameters.name: layoutoption
required_parameters.description: This is the new layoutoption object to be used for the app (first page). The value passed is an hash of type LayoutOption.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Set App Layoutoption
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to set new layoutoption values of the first page for one of his apps.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

optional_parameters.name: autoopen
optional_parameters.description: If the layout is "fixedmenu", this indicates the index of the first page to open when the app is launched. If not present the first page is opened.

optional_parameters.name: cell_margin
optional_parameters.description: This contains an array with 4 margin values, indicating respectively the cell top, right, bottom, left margins.

optional_parameters.name: halign
optional_parameters.description: This indicates the horizontal align for the elements container to the page. Used only if "width" is different from "100"(%). Possible values: "left|center|right".

optional_parameters.name: hideDescription
optional_parameters.description: If this key exists, the element description is set to an empty string.

optional_parameters.name: hideTitle
optional_parameters.description: If this key exists, the element title is set to an empty string.

optional_parameters.name: ipadautoopen
optional_parameters.description: On iPad, if the layout is different from "lowpanel", this indicates the index of the first page to open when the app is launched. If not present the first page is opened.

optional_parameters.name: nrows
optional_parameters.description: This indicates the number of rows visible for the elements container.

optional_parameters.name: rotate
optional_parameters.description: Defines if the app should rotate when used in landscape mode or not. If the key does not exist, the app will rotate.

optional_parameters.name: row_height
optional_parameters.description: This indicates the height of every rows of the elements container.

optional_parameters.name: scroll
optional_parameters.description: This indicates the scroll direction of the elements container, when scroll is needed. Possible values: "vertical|horizontal".

optional_parameters.name: valign
optional_parameters.description: This indicates the vertical align for the elements container to the page. Used only if "nrows" is set. Possible values: "top|middle|bottom".

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: This is the width of the elements container in percentage respect the page width. The value is a number, but must be interpreted as a percentage value.

api_list.name: Add Certificate
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to upload iOS and Android certificates and keys required to compile a specific app package.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

required_parameters.name: device
required_parameters.description: This is the type of device to upload the certificate for. Allowed values: "apple|android".

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Required when device = "apple". This is the password used to generate the .p12 certificate file.

optional_parameters.name: p12
optional_parameters.description: Required when device = "apple". This is the .p12 certificate file.

optional_parameters.name: mobileprovision
optional_parameters.description: Required when device = "apple". This is the mobile provision file.

optional_parameters.name: keystore
optional_parameters.description: Required when device = "android". This is the keystore file.

optional_parameters.name: keystorepwd
optional_parameters.description: Required when device = "android". This is the password used to generate the keystore file.

optional_parameters.name: alias
optional_parameters.description: Required when device = "android". This is the key alias.

optional_parameters.name: pwd
optional_parameters.description: Required when device = "android". This is the alias password.

api_list.name: Set Build Option
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to set a building option on one of his apps.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: This is the name of the option to be set. Possible values: "disableipad|audio|gps".

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: This is a boolean value for the option set by the name parameter. Possible values: 0|1.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Set App Theme
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to set a new theme for one of his apps.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the theme ID.

required_parameters.name: app_id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Set App Style
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to set new style values for one of his apps. New values should be passed as a list of parameters, using the parameter name set to the style option name, and the parameter value set to the style option value.

required_parameters.name: name_of_key_1
required_parameters.description: This is a couple key-value that will be inserted in as a new style option.

required_parameters.name: name_of_key_N
required_parameters.description: This is a couple key-value that will be inserted in as a new style option.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Replace App Style
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to replace previous style values for one of his apps. New values should be passed as a list of parameters, using the parameter name set to the style option name, and the parameter value set to the style option value.

required_parameters.name: name_of_key_1
required_parameters.description: This is a couple key-value that will be inserted in as a new style option.

required_parameters.name: name_of_key_N
required_parameters.description: This is a couple key-value that will be inserted in as a new style option.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Send Message
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to send a push notification message for one of his apps, to all devices using it or to a specified group of users ID. The message is added to the outgoing queue and could be considered surely delivered after 30 minutes from the sending time. Returns "success" or "error" for the respective state.

required_parameters.name: message
required_parameters.description: This is the message that will be added to the outgoing queue and delivered to the users.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: This is a Y-m-d H:i:s value at which the notification should be send. Use current time to send it as soon as possible.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

optional_parameters.name: device
optional_parameters.description: This is an array of devices type for which the notification should be sent. Possible values: apple, android, windows.

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: This is the latitude value to limit your notification delivery based on latitude, longitude and radius values.

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: This is the longitude value to limit your notification delivery based on latitude, longitude and radius values.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: This is the radius value to limit your notification delivery based on latitude, longitude and radius values.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: This is an optional URL that will be opened when the user taps on the notification message.

optional_parameters.name: stop
optional_parameters.description: This is an ending date for the geofencing feature.

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description: This is an optional list of users ID that allows you to send the push notification to specific users or groups of them.

api_list.name: Set App Layoutoption Values
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to set new layoutoption values (only the ones that have a complex structure, for simple options see Set App Layoutoption) of the first page for one of his apps. The only possible options settable by this method are: "banner|banners|win8". The couples key-value passed as arguments will be inserted into the new specified option. The only admitted options are: "colorscheme|banners|win8".

required_parameters.name: name_of_key_1
required_parameters.description: This is a couple key-value that will be inserted in the new option.

required_parameters.name: name_of_key_N
required_parameters.description: This is a couple key-value that will be inserted in the new option (the request can have N couples).

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

required_parameters.name: option
required_parameters.description: This is the name of the new option. Possible values: "colorscheme|banners|win8".

api_list.name: Login User
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to login. Returns an object with keys "result" (with "true" in case of success, otherwise "false") and "access_token" (that contains the token needed for authentication HTTP header - see Readme page).

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: This is an existing username.

required_parameters.name: password
required_parameters.description: This is the password related to the existing username.

required_parameters.name: cms_id
required_parameters.description: This is the CMS ID where the user wants to login.

api_list.name: Login AppsBuilder User
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to login on the AppsBuilder website. Notice: this function acts on AppsBuilder platform, not on CMS. Returns an object with keys "result" (with "true" in case of success, otherwise "false") and "access_token" (that contains the token needed for authentication HTTP header - see Readme page).

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: This is an existing username.

required_parameters.name: password
required_parameters.description: This is the password related to the existing username.

api_list.name: Get App Style
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to get one of his app style values. To obtain the value for a KEY, pass that key as the "style" parameter. To obtain all the key-values available, pass "all_styles" as "style" parameter. Returns a JSON hash containing the set values.

required_parameters.name: style
required_parameters.description: "all_styles" to obtain all available key-values, or a specific KEY name to obtain its value.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Get Feeds Infos
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to retrieve the informations for all his feeds, or for selected group of IDs. Returns a JSON array.

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description: This is a list of feed IDs to return informations of. Multiple IDs must be separated by commas. It not passed the method returns the informations for all the user's feeds.

api_list.name: Set App Content
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to set the content of one of his apps. Returns "true" on success, or "false" on failure.

required_parameters.name: tree
required_parameters.description: This is an array of Page objects, that represents the app content structure.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.

api_list.name: Set Adv Values
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to set the values for his app advertisement services.

required_parameters.name: inmobi
required_parameters.description: This is the Inmobi publisher ID.

required_parameters.name: inmobi_verification
required_parameters.description: This is the Inmobi verification code.

required_parameters.name: mobfox
required_parameters.description: This is the Mobfox publisher ID.

required_parameters.name: adsense
required_parameters.description: This is the Adsense publisher ID.

required_parameters.name: neomobile
required_parameters.description: This is the Neomobile publisher ID.

required_parameters.name: custom
required_parameters.description: This is a custom URL where to retrieve the advertisement.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the app ID.
